GSP29vnyps00u:3_1: jīvitamiva nyāyavistarasya vidyāsthānasya śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivarakṣuṇṇavartmano brahmamīmāṃsāśāstrasya ca /
GSP29vnyps00u:4: anupajīvya cedaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ ko vibhavaḥ sapanditumapi śeṣasya vidyāsthānajātasya ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:5: sarvameva hi loke śrutaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyāmāhitapāriplavaṃ vātyāspṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaśakalaṃ na kathañcidapi pratitiṣṭhati /
GSP29vnyps00u:6: pramāṇaparīkṣayā tu yathāvadupapāditayā dṛṣadeva vyapoḍhavikṣobhaṃ niṣkampamavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29vnyps00u:8: padavākyapramāṇabhedena hi tredhā vibhajanti śāstraṃ śāstravidaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:13: svātmanyapyanupajātavisrambhāṃ ḍolāyamānāṃ buddhiṃ kareṇumiva tarkaśṛṅkhalābhirālānayanmananavyapadeśaṃ śāstram ; yasya saṃjñāntaraṃ nyāyavistaraḥ tarkaśāstram ityādi //
GSP29vnyps00u:14: tadetat pramāṇapradhānamapi pramāṇagateḥ prameyasvarūpavivecanaparyavasānatayā prameyepi nyastapadaṃ pravṛttam /
GSP29vnyps00u:15_0: itaretaravisaṃvādasaṃrabdhoddhurairāstikairnāstikaiśca bahudhā vādibhiḥ svasvacchandānurodhenānyathā cānyathā ca prameyaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:15_1: pratipadyamānairitastataḥ parikṛṣyamāṇāni pramāṇānyapi parāvṛttarūpatayā lakṣaṇato durgrahāṇyabhūvan /
GSP29vnyps00u:16: mānābhāsavyāmiśrāṇi hi mānāni na sukarāṇi vivektum /
GSP29vnyps00u:17: tadevaṃ śāstrameva paṅkilīkṛtaṃ cakṣuriva timiropasṛṣṭaṃ vigalitārthagrahaṇāpāṭava saṃvṛttam
GSP29vnyps00u:18_1: kṛtamatayopi svasvopadeśapāramparīpratyayādekatamaṃ pakṣamabhimanyamānāḥ sparigrahāvasādakātaratayā pakṣāntareṣu sābhyasūyāścirāyāpi
GSP29vnyps00u:19_0: ataḥ sarvopayogāya doṣaguṇahānopādānābhyāṃ śikṣaṇīyasyāsya nyāyavistarasya pṛthakprasthānaṃ nyāyadarśanaṃ nāma sūtrajātaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:19_1: gautamena muninā prathamaṃ praṇītam ; yatra pramāṇāpramāṇādivivecanayā tattvanirṇayopāyāstatra ca saṃbhavanto guṇadoṣāḥ kathāsu
GSP29vnyps00u:20: tacca nyāyadarśanaṃ prathamaṃ pramāṇaprameyādisūtreṇa ṣoḍaśadhā padārthān vibhajya tatparīkṣaṇena caritārthama /
GSP29vnyps00u:21_0: tatra prameyatvasya kevalānvayinaḥ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇatayā vibhājakatvamanupapadyamānaṃ manyamānena kaṇādena muninā kṛtsnameva
GSP29vnyps00u:22_0: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyābhāvān vitathamevāpadārthān padārthayatā tathāvidhameva cānyadanyadālapatā grāhyamagṛhṇatā
GSP29vnyps00u:22_1: tyājyaṃ cātyajatā kaṇabhakṣeṇa dūramapathīkṛtaḥ śāstrapatha iti brahmasūtrakārādibhiḥ pratikṣipto vaiśeṣikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:23_0: nyāyapakṣastu śaṅkyamānopasargopi kathañcidvyākhyānādheyasaṃskāratayā nātyarthaparivarjanīyaḥ iti manyamānāḥ katipayasaṃskārasaṃskṛtamimaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:23_1: pakṣaṃ parigṛhya nibandhān nibabandhuḥ pūrve kecidācāryāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:24: te ca nibandhā eṣu divaseṣu nāmnaiva
GSP29vnyps00u:27_1: vivaraṇaṃ ṣaḍarthasaṃkṣepaśceti granthadvayam, aviditaprabandhṛvyapadeśaṃ nyāyasudarśanaṃ prajñāparitrāṇāṃ ceti prabandhayugalam,
GSP29vnyps00u:30_0: mātulena ca vādihaṃsāmbuvāhaḥ iti praśastināmāṅkitena ātreyarāmānujācāryeṇa kṛtaṃ svapratibhādraviṇanikṣepāyamāṇaṃ nyāyakuliśābhidhānaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:30_1: cetyete nibandhāḥ nyāyapariśuddhikṛtaivācāryeṇa tatra tatra bhūyiṣṭhamudāhriyante yadeva yāvadeva cācāryeṇa kvacit kvacidudāhṛtaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:36_0: hanta ! niḥśeṣakṣālitākhilakalaṅkasyāpyasya śrībhagavadrāmānujasiddhāntasyedamekaṃ śocanīyaṃ vaiśasam ; yat tāvadācāryapadābhiṣiktairapyarvācīnairbudhavaraiḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:37_1: prācāmācāryāṇāṃ vāgvistarā etarhi śrotumapi durlabhatāṃ gamitārḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:38: idṛśoyaṃ vidyāvadhaḥ kasya vā vidyāvyasanino na dūnoti mānasam ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:40: asyaivācāryasya vāṅmadhuniṣyando mudhaiva kiyān na visraṃsitaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:43_2: lokaśreyase jātāni granthajātāni tatra vedānte tāvat tattvaṭīkā nāma śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivaraviracitasya śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyasya
GSP29vnyps00u:44: sā ca prathamasūtramātramapi yāvadasamagropalabdhapracārā vedāntavidyāvicārakāṅkṣiṇāṃ cintāvyasanāyaiva khaṇḍabhūtā paridṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:45: vicitrāyodhanākuṇṭhaśaktau tejasvini svāṃ śakti samagramadarśayitvaiva niyatiyaiyātyenākasmāduparataṃ yodharatne taṭasthadṛṣṭe kasya vā vīradharmamanutiṣṭhato hṛdayaṃ na dūyeta /
GSP29vnyps00u:47: kecinmanyeran ācāryaireva na samāpūritāyaṃ grantha iti, tadetat svopamānena sarvatra śaktiparicchedaṃ kalayatāṃ pralapitamatra na kramate /
GSP29vnyps00u:49: śrutān yathāśrutamarthān patreṣu viniveśya prakāśayanto lokamanugṛhṇanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:53_0: anye tu nirantarabhajanakṛtaprasadanena bhagavatā sarveśvareṇa dūrapratyūḍhapratyūhavipruṣo niḥśreyasāvadhīni kuśalajātānyanubhavituṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:53_2: gaṇanīyānubhāvā vilakṣaṇāḥ prabandhakṛtaḥ; yeṣāmekapratibhāsūtrasyūtāni prameyaratnāni punaḥ punaḥ pariśīlitānyapi navanavānīva
GSP29vnyps00u:53_3: prajñāvatāṃ hṛdayeṣu kamapi camatkāramāvahanti na ca kadācit purāṇacitravad vicchāyāni bhavanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:54: nyāpariśuddhikṛdācāryastu dvitīyatṛtīyayorubhayorapri kakṣyayoḥ hārāvalyoriva nāyakamaṇiḥ prakāśata iti tattvavidāmaparokṣam /
GSP29vnyps00u:57_0: tādṛśānāmayatnanirvartanīye lokopakārārthe samārambhe cikīrṣitavicchedaḥ kathamupapadyate evaṅguṇena cācāryacūḍāmaṇipavanā
GSP29vnyps00u:57_1: śiṣyabuddhiṃ prasādayitumārabdhā kṛtirasamāpya madhye apaviddhā bhavatīti ko nukhalu prabhāvavedī pratipattumarhati ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:62: iti svakṛtasya bhāṣyapravacanasya aṣṭāviṃśyāmāvṛttau tattvaṭīkānibandhapraṇayanamācāryastattvaṭīkāprārambhe svayameva spaṣṭamāha /
GSP29vnyps00u:65: śreyaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāthaḥ śrutipathyaṃ nāthaprītyai nāṭakamarthyaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:67: iti sūtradhāravācā śārīrakabhāṣyapravacanaṃ saṃkalpasūryodayanirmāṇakāle triṃśadvārakṛtaṃ prathayati /
GSP29vnyps00u:68: tadānīmeva triṃśadvāraṃ śārīrakabhāṣyapravacanamāsīdyadi, tataḥ paścāt pravacanāvṛttayastatopi hi bhūyasyo bhavitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:71: śatadūṣaṇyāḥ samanantaraṃ tattvaṭīkā kṛteti ca pratīyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:77: pravartitā ca pātreṣu tasmai śreṣṭhāya maṅgalam //
GSP29vnyps00u:79_0: śruprakāśikācāryasya himlecchabalopamardalagnasya nijagurusabrahmacāriṇo mumūrṣataḥ prārthanayā tadgrantharakṣaṇapravacanayoraṅgīkārepi
GSP29vnyps00u:83: pratipādyantu, naite śrutaprakāśikāyāmanyatra vā granthāntare pratipattuṃ sulabhāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:84: kiñca svācāryairvādihaṃsāmbuvāhāryaiḥ praṇīte vidyamāna eva hi nyāyakuliśākhye nyāyanibandharatne nyāyapariśuddhimācāryaḥ svayaṃ nibabandha /
GSP29vnyps00u:85: avaśyavaktavyeṣu cārtheṣu joṣaṃbhāvaḥ kathañcidapi śāsrācāryatāyāḥ sadṛśo na bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:89_0: iti prabandhopakramapratijñānameva pradarśayati granthāntarairacaritārthasya sarvavedāntārthasaṃskārasya mahāmatibhirapi
GSP29vnyps00u:89_1: sarvajñasakāśāt śuśrūṣitasya pratipādanārthamapūrvāyāḥ kṛteḥ samārambha iti sa kathaṃ na paripūryeta ? /
GSP29vnyps00u:90: kiñca nijanibandhasya śrutaprakāśikārakṣaṇāṅgīkārasamaya eva labdhaprasaratāmanusmṛtya parakīyagranthapravacanamaṅgīkṛtamācāryairiti śakyamabhyūhitum /
GSP29vnyps00u:93: yathāhi nyāyasiddhāñjanamapi jaḍadravyaparicche denaiva paryavasitaṃ sāṃprataṃ paridṛśyate, adravyaparicchedastu patita eva /
GSP29vnyps00u:97: jñātavyamanyadapi tairniraṇāyi samya- ggranthāntareṣviti na kiñcidihāsti
GSP29vnyps00u:102: śeṣe tu mithyaiva kimapyaitihyaṃ kalpayitvā katipaye prajalpanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:103_0: yattāvat dvaitamatakhaṇḍanaparaḥ śeṣo granthaḥ madhvamatasthena kenacidyatinā bhikṣāmaṭatā savinayamupasṛtya prārthitoyamācāryaḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:103_1: taṃ tasya bhikṣārthe prāyacchiditi, tadapi na vicārakṣamam na hyācāryagrantheṣu kvacidapi madhvamataṃ nirasyate /
GSP29vnyps00u:104_0: tattvaviplavābhāvāt, avāntareṣu cārtheṣu naiyāyikavaiśeṣikādipratipāditasyaiva dvaitasyānuvādāt, anatipracuratayā tasya matasya
GSP29vnyps00u:106: śatadūṣaṇī ca śaṅkādikṛtasūtravyākhyānādinirāsārthameva pravṛtteti ca tadgranthamukha eva sphuṭībhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:107: tatra hi ---- “prācīmupetya padavīṃ yatirājadṛṣṭāṃ tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:108: prājñā yathoditamidaṃ śukavat paṭhantaḥ pracchannabauddhavijaye parito
GSP29vnyps00u:111: atra 'tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ' ityanena dvaitinaḥ svapakṣīkriyante /
GSP29vnyps00u:118: ' ityatra tu śaṅkarādītyādipadaṃ yādavabhāskarayoḥ saṃgrahāyeti sthitam /
GSP29vnyps00u:121_0: kiñcidupanyasyate---kṛṣṇamiśro hi gauḍadeśīyaḥ paṇḍitacūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu kalāsu ca saviśeṣakṛtaśramaḥ kaviśca brahmādvaitaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:121_1: siddhantamātiṣṭhamāno vādakutūhalitayā sarvā diśaḥ paryaṭan jitakāśī krameṇa dakṣiṇāndiśamācakrāma /
GSP29vnyps00u:122: tatra śrīraṅgaṃ divyakṣetraṃ viduṣāmāvāsamākarṇya devasevāpadeśena vādasamaramarthayamānaḥ śrīraṅgarājasya bhavagataḥ prāsādamāsadāda /
GSP29vnyps00u:123_0: tadānīṃ tatra bhāṣāmayīrgāthāḥ sarāgatālaṃ gīyamānā niśamya tatkartṝṇāṃ ca kavīnāṃ varṇāvarāṇāmapi pratimāstasmin devālaye
GSP29vnyps00u:123_1: devopacārairārādhyamānā viditvā tatra sevāsamavetān jñānavṛddhān śrīvaiṣṇavānāmantrya 'bhoḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:124: prājñāḥ, bhavatāmanenāpabhraṃśapāṭhena varṇāvarapūjanena ca dūrāpoḍhaṃ veṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:126: anthathākṛtamakṛtaṃ hi bhavati' iti sākṣepaṃ papraccha /
GSP29vnyps00u:127_0: yadā tairmilitairapi na kiñcidākṣepasadṛśamuttaraṃ pratipannaṃ, tadā tadātanāya taddeśādhipataye tamarthamāvedya, pratiṣṭhāprabhṛti
GSP29vnyps00u:127_1: sarva evālayasaṃskāraḥ kāryaḥ pratyagra eva iti ca niyamya taṃ divyālayaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:129_0: lokācāryaprabhṛtayaśca bahavastatra darśanaguravastādṛśaṃ vaiśasamacintitopanatamanusmṛtya durante duḥkhasāgare nimagnāstaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:129_1: ca prativādinaṃ sarvavidyāviśāradaṃ vādāhavanavaśūramaprakampyamākalayantaḥ sabhāmabhinavāṃ kāmapi saṃgamayya tasyānarthasya
GSP29vnyps00u:130: tasmin mahati sadasi viduṣāṃ saṃpradāyācāryaḥ śrīmān lokācāryaḥ sarveṣāṃ sabhāsadāmavadheyavacanaḥ samarthāmabhyarhitāṃ vācamādade--- “bhoḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:134: asti kila kāñcyāṃ nagaryāṃ veṅkaṭanāthāryo nāma viduṣāṃ prathamaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:135: sa hi vṛṣaśailanāthasya ghaṇṭāṃśa evāvatīrṇaḥ iti tattvavidāṃ grahaṇam /
GSP29vnyps00u:136_0: soyaṃ pañcavarṣadeśīyaḥ śiśureva san nijamātulena vādihaṃsāmbuvāhenātreyarāmānujācāryeṇa śārīrakabhāṣyagrahaṇāya varadagurusakāśaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:136_1: gacchatā priyabhāgineyena nītastatra bhāṣyaviṣaye prasaktān bahūn saṃdehaśṛṅkhalāgranthīn visraṃsayaṃstayā tatrasamavetayā
GSP29vnyps00u:136_2: prajñāvṛddhapariṣadā apūrvaprasādavismayacitritacittayā sabahumānamavalokitaḥ śrīmatā ca varadaguruṇā śrībhagavadrāmānujasiddhāntasya
GSP29vnyps00u:138: ' ityāśiṣaṃ prayuñjānena 'asya kumārasya svataḥ pratibhātasamastaśāstrārthasārasya vidyāsaṃskāramātraphalo
GSP29vnyps00u:140: na tu jñāne kaścidapi śaktileśa ādheyo bhavati /
GSP29vnyps00u:141: bhagavānapi hi devakīnandanaḥ vidyāgrahaṇāya sāṃdīpinerācāryasya sakāśe gurukulavāsamagrahīt
GSP29vnyps00u:142: kiṃ cāsya śaiśava evāyaṃ prajñāprakarṣo dāśaratheriva vikramatiśayo janmasiddhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:144: sābhyasūyāḥ savismāyā vā dṛśo nāsmin bālavayasi patitumarhanti /
GSP29vnyps00u:145: dṛṣṭidoṣairhi viṣānalairiva prasaradbhistarava ivāvalāḍhāḥ kati nāma mahāguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ svaguṇairlokamanupakṛtyaivāstaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:147: śrībhagavadrāmānujasiddhāntasyaiṣa jayadhvajaḥ samucchrīyatām' iyādiśya śiśurasau nijamātule vādihaṃsāmbudācārye nyāsīkṛtaḥ //
GSP29vnyps00u:148: athāsau vayasā viṃśativarṣadeśīya eva san sarvatomukhaprasṛtaprabodhatayā pareṣāmanabhibhavanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
GSP29vnyps00u:149_0: evamakṣayyapratibhādraviṇena sarveṣvapi ca tantreṣu nirāmayaṃ panthānamavagantuṃ prasādayituṃ cālaṅkarmīṇena cācāryeṇā sārdhaṃ
GSP29vnyps00u:149_1: kadācit kāñcīnagare devadevasya bhagavataḥ śrīdevarājasya vaiśākhamāsike yātrāmahotsave vidvatsaṃvādakutūhalitayā samāgataḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:150_0: sarvapathīnavaiduṣīvibhavaḥ prabandharatnapraṇetā cākhilaśāstreṣu vidyāraṇya iti kṛtapraśastināmadheyo mādhavācāryo nāma
GSP29vnyps00u:150_1: vedabhāṣyakṛt vādāhave lagno niraṅkuśaniśitatarkaśarāsāravarṣiṇaḥ ācāryasyāgrataḥ pratyavasthātumakṣamo vismayabahumānabharitamanā
GSP29vnyps00u:150_2: vijayanagaraṃ prayātaḥ svaśiṣyasya rājñastamarthaṃ yathāvṛttamāvedya tathāvidhavidvadratnadarśanotkaṇṭhātvaritasya prabhoḥ
GSP29vnyps00u:150_4: ca caturaṅgabalaṃ praṇīyaḥ prārthito vairāgyapañcakaṃ tasya pratyuttarayāñcakāra /
GSP29vnyps00u:151: tena ca mādhavācāryeṇa svīye sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe rāmānujadarśanamupakṣipatā--- 'taduktaṃ
